memberdef.argsstring: (crg::FramePass const &pass, crg::GraphContext &context, crg::RunnableGraph &graph, RenderDevice const &device, castor::String const &typeName, CameraUbo const &cameraUbo, SceneCuller &culler, ShadowMap const &shadowMap, bool needsVsm, bool needsRsm, bool isStatic)
memberdef.name: ShadowMapPass

parameterdescription.para: The shadow map pass type name.
Tells if the pass needs to generate variance shadow map.
Tells if the pass needs to generate reflective shadow maps.
Tells if the pass is for static nodes.

simplesect.para: true if the object is rendered through this nodes pass.

briefdescription.para: Fills the render pass specific descriptor layout bindings.
